scenario: XYZ Corp incurred the following expenses: Employee Salaries: $7,498.14, Traffic Fines: $1,826.30, Political Contributions: $821.09, Office Rent: $6,041.24, Personal Lunch: $9,615.09.
question: Calculate the total deductible trade or business expenses under I.R.C. § 162.
answer_explanation: Only ordinary and necessary business expenses are deductible. Fines, bribes, and personal expenses are not. Total: $13,539.38.
